Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are expressing their concerns and frustration with the upcoming Federal budget all over social media. While the LNP is demanding full funding for the Ring Road in Rockhampton General practitioners are urging for changes in the budget to assist more people in affording health cover. Meanwhile Homelessness Australia and a committee investigating the JobSeeker rate are urging for more support and a substantial increase in the rate respectively. However there has been criticism of the recent announcement by Federal Labor that there will be no JobSeeker raise in the May budget.
